                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পিপেট, ব্যুরেট, ডেসিকেটর: পাইরেক্স বা পটাস গ্লাস।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-০৫]</p>
</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: অনার্দ্র <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="width: 3.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.95em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-42"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-44"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-45" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-46" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-47" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-48"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-49" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-50" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\rm Na_2CO_3</script></span> প্রাইমারি স্ট্যান্ডার্ড পদার্থ। প্রাইমারি স্ট্যান্ডার্ড পদার্থ থেকে প্রমাণ দ্রবণ (0.1 M) তৈরি করা হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-০৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি মারাত্মক বিষাক্ত পদার্থ?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৫]</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পরিত্যক্ত এসিডকে প্রশমিত করতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="width: 3.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.95em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-186"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-188"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-192"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm Na_2CO_3</script></span> বা চুনের গুঁড়া ব্যবহৃত হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পরমাণুর ৪র্থ শক্তিস্তরে মোট ইলেকট্রন ধারণক্ষমতা কত? &nbsp;</p>

                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>64</p>
</label>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: যেকোনো উপশক্তিস্তরের সর্বোচ্চ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="width: 1.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1000.86em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-196"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-197"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm e^-</script></span> ধারণক্ষমতা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="width: 1.518em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1001.23em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-201"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-203"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\rm 2n^2</script></span>।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ১০৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

</label>

</label>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ডাবল ডাম্বেলাকার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: s&nbsp;অরবিটালের আকৃতি - গোলক আকার;<br>
d অরবিটালের আকৃতি - ডাবল ডাম্বেলাকার;<br>
f অরবিটালের আকৃতি - জটিলাকৃতি।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ১১৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: জাল টাকা ও জাল পাসপোর্ট শনাক্তকরণে UV রশ্মি ব্যবহৃত হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৩৫]</p>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

</label>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                            </div>

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আসমানী</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: H-এর রেখা বর্ণালিতে 1 টি লাল , 1 টি আসমানি, 1 টি নীল এবং 1 টি বেগুনি বর্ণের রেখা দেখতে পাওয়া যায়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ১৪২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১৩৩]&nbsp;</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন রশ্মি ত্বকে তাপীয় অনুভূতি জাগায়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Far IR</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>X-ray</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>UV ray</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Near IR</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: FIR এর রয়েছে স্নায়বিক রোগ আরোগ্য করার অধিক ক্ষমতা, NIR ত্বকে তাপীয় অনুভূতি জাগাতে পারে না।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ১৫৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 13 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-248" style="width: 2.461em;                                 </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৩১]</p>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 14 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-327" style="width: 3.243em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="width: 1.869em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>.</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="width: 17.133em; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-414" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-415"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-416"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-417" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-420" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">[</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-422"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-424"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-426"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-427"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-429" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">]</span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.625em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.117em, 1002.05em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-432"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-433" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-434"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-436"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-437" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-439" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.174em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">S</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-444" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.256em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1001.72em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-445"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-447"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-448" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 1.846em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-452" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-454"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-456" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>.</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\rm \therefore K_{sp}=\left[Ca^{2+}\right]\left[Cl^-\right]^2=S.\left(2S\right)^2=4S^3 </script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ১৬৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এখানে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-457" style="width: 3.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1002.42em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-458"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">\rm (n+1)</script></span> এর মান-<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="width: 8.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(4.715em, 1006.89em, 9.428em, -999.998em); top: -5.49em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-465"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.928em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1006.89em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-469" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1006.72em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -2.703em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-480" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-481" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-482" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-483" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-484" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1006.89em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -1.473em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-485" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-487" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-489" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-492" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-493" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-494" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1006.72em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -0.285em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-495" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-496" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-498" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-499" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-500" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-502" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.494em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.697em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.553em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\rm 5p\ \rightarrow5+1=6&nbsp;\\ 3f\ \rightarrow3+3=6&nbsp;\\ 4d\ \rightarrow4+2=6&nbsp;\\ 6s\ \rightarrow6+0=6&nbsp;</script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="width: 3.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1002.99em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-506"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-507" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-508" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-509" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-510" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\rm \therefore (n + l) </script></span> এর মান সমান, তাই যে অরবিটালের n এর মান সর্বোচ্চ, তার শক্তিও সর্বোচ্চ হবে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ১২৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 16 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৯৫]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 17 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সবচেয়ে ক্ষুদ্রতম কণিকা কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1000.49em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-584"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.653em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>α</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">\alpha</script></span>- কণা ও ডিউটেরন কণা হলো ভারী কণা, প্রোটন ও নিউট্রনের ভর ইলেকট্রনের তুলনায় অনেক বেশী।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 18 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>যে সকল পরমাণুর নিউট্রন সংখ্যা সমান তারা পরস্পর-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আইসোটোন</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আইসোবার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আইসোটোপ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আইসোইলেকট্রিক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>পরমাণুর ক্ষেত্রে-<br>
প্রোটন সংখ্যা সমান, নিউট্রন সংখ্যা অসমান- আইসোটোপ।<br>
প্রোটন সংখ্যা অসমান, ভর সংখ্যা সমান- আইসোবার।<br>
প্রোটন সংখ্যা অসমান, নিউট্রন সংখ্যা সমান- আইসোটোন<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="width: 1.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1000.86em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-587"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-588"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-590" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm e^-</script></span> সংখ্যা সমান- আইসোইলেকট্রিক।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৮]</p>
</span>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-591" style="width: 1.459em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.19em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-592"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-593"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-594" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.776em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-595" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\rm O_2 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৮৭]</p>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 29 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-733" style="width: 2.573em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৮৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    </div>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-795" style="width: 2.917em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0026;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-802" style="width: 6.109em; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-816" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">&amp;</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79">\rm MgO \ \&\ Al_2O_3</script></span>- অটো-মোবাইল স্পার্ক প্লাগ, উচ্চ তাপমাত্রার ইলেকট্রিক হিটার, প্রভৃতি বৈদ্যুতিক যন্ত্রে রোধক বা ইনস্যুলেটর রূপে। <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-817" style="width: 2.051em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বন্ধন কোণ:<br>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 34 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>গলনাঙ্কের ক্ষেত্রে নিচের কোন ক্রমটি সঠিক?</p>

                                        </div>

                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪২]</p>

                            <div class="row question">

                                            <span>Question 35 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বরফ পানির উপরে ভেসে থাকার মূল কারণ কী?</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>লন্ডন বল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ডাইপোল-ডাইপোল আকর্ষণ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>H বন্ধনের ভূমিকা:<br>
১। পানি কক্ষ তাপমাত্রায় তরল।<br>
২। প্রোটিনের পলি অ্যামাইড শিকলের সেকেন্ডারি ও টারশিয়ারি কাঠামো।<br>
৩। বরফের পানিতে ভেসে থাকা।<br>
৪। নিউক্লিক এসিডের গঠন <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1037" style="width: 7.42em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.068em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1005.99em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1038"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1042" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1043" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1044" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">C</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1046" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1047" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1048" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1049" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>≡</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">\rm (A = T, C\ \equiv\ G)</script></span>।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩৫৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1077" style="width: 1.068em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1081" style="width: 6.232em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: প্রসাবের pH: 4.5-8.0<br>
লালার pH: 6.2-7.4<br>
মাতৃদুগ্ধের pH: 6.6-6.9<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫১১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৩৬]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 40 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন pH মানের দ্রবণে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1196" style="width: 1.678em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.343em, 1001.38em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1197"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1198"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1200" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.048em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-114">\rm H^+</script></span> আয়নের ঘনমাত্রা সবচেয়ে বেশি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: pH বৃদ্ধি পেলে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1201" style="width: 3.322em;
