                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 41 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পেন্টাইল অ্যাসিটেট পাওয়া যায় কোনটিতে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পাকা কলায়</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পাকা কমলায়</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পাকা আনারসে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>জেসমিন ফুলে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পাকা কলা → পেন্টাইল অ্যাসিটেট<br>
পাকা কমলা → অক্টাইল অ্যাসিটেট<br>
পাকা আনারস → বিউটাইল বিউটারেট<br>
জেসমিন ফুল → বেনজাইল অ্যাসিটেট<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা- ৩০২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: মানুষের রক্তের pH 7.0 এর কম হলে একে অ্যাসিডোসিস বলে।&nbsp;<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫০৭]</p>
</span>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 43 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি দিয়ে ক্ষারীয় বাফার দ্রবণ তৈরি করা যাবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>অম্লীয় বাফার দ্রবণের উদাহরণ:<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo>;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1306" style="width: 22.256em; ক্ষারীয় বাফার দ্রবণের উদাহরণ:<br>

[দুর্বল এসিড + এসিডের লবণ = বাফার লবণ]<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৯৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 44 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কত ডিগ্রী তাপমাত্রায় সাধারণ ফ্রিজে খাদ্যবস্তু সংরক্ষণ করা হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 46 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>চিনির আর্দ্রবিশ্লেষণের জন্য কোন এনজাইম দায়ী?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ইনভার্টেস</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: জাইমেস এনজাইমের প্রভাবে ইনভার্ট চিনি বিয়োজিত হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬১৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 47 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোল্ডক্রিমে অ্যান্টিসেপটিকরূপে কোনটি ব্যবহৃত হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>গোলাপ জলের সুগন্ধের কারণ নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

</label>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: গোলাপ জলের সুগন্ধের জন্য জেরানিওল ও ফিনাইল ইথাইল অ্যালকোহল নামক টারপিনস দায়ী।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৯৮]</p>
</span>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 51 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্থির তাপমাত্রায় 100 kPa চাপে একটি গ্যাসের আয়তন 1L হয় 125 kPa চাপে ঐ গ্যাসের আয়তন কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>0.6 L</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>0.8 L</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>1.25 L</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>1.5 L</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-141-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>100</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>125</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1482" style="width: 19.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.986em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1015.95em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1483"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1484"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1486" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1487"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1489" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1491" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1492" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1493" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1494"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1495" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1496" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1498" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1499"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1500" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1501" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1502" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1503" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.6em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.818em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1504"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1505"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1506" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1507" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1508"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1509" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1510" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.78em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1511"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1512" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1513" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.72em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1514" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1515" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.93em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.982em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1516"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1517" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1518" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1519" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1520" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">125</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.09em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.092em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.8</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1523" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1524" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>100</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>125</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.8</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-141">\rm P_1V_1=P_2V_2\Rightarrow\ V_2=\frac{P_1V_1}{P_2}=\frac{100\times1}{125}=0.8\ L </script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 52 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কক্ষ তাপমাত্রায় হাইড্রোজেন অণুুর বর্গমূল গড়-বর্গ গতিবেগ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>প্রায়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-145-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>876.34</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1558" style="width: 6.423em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.239em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.277em, 1005.24em, 2.37em, -999.998em); </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কক্ষ তাপমাত্রায় অক্সিজেন, নাইট্রোজেন গ্যাসের অণুসমূহের বর্গমূল গড়-বর্গ গতিবেগ প্রায় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-146-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>500</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1569" style="width: 3.977em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1570"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1571" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">500</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1574"><span style="display: inline-block;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: 1 atm&nbsp;চাপ বা তার নিচে এবং উচ্চতাপমাত্রায় বাস্তব গ্যাসসমূহ মোটামুটি আদর্শ আচরণ করে।<br>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আয়তন সমান হলে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: গ্যাসের গড় গতিশক্তি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-147-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1580" style="width: 6.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.961em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.88em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1581"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1583"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1585" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1586" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1587" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1588" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1589" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1590" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1591" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1592" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1593" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-147">\rm (E_k=\frac{3}{2}nRT) </script></span> নির্ভর করে গ্যাসের পরিমাণ (n) ও কেলভিন তাপমাত্রার উপর।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-148-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1594" style="width: 2.37em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-149-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1600" style="width: 2.416em; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.731em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1605" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ব্যাপন হার, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-152-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></msqrt></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1617" style="width: 3.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.748em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.75em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1618"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1619" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1621" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1622" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.23em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1623"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1624"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1625" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.66em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.36em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>∝</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></msqrt></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-152">\rm r\propto\frac{1}{\sqrt M}</script></span><br>
স্থিরতাপমাত্রা ও চাপে, কম মোলার ভরের গ্যাসের ব্যাপন হার বেশি হবে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-157-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1646" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.3em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1647"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1648"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1649" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1650" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1651" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1652" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1653" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-157">\rm H_2, He</script></span> এর ক্ষেত্রে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-158-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1654" style="width: 2.461em; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৭,৭৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-166-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1704" style="width: 7.789em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1705"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1708"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.148em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.144em, 1004.6em, 4.374em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1709"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1711"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1714" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.915em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1001.46em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1715"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1716"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1717" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1718" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.732em; left: 4.693em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1721" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.386em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.392em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-166">\rm Ca\left(H-{\rm CO}_3\right)_2 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পানিতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-167-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1722" style="width: 5.084em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.141em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.14em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1723"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1725"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1726" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1727"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1728"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1729" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1730" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">M</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1733"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1734" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1735"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1736"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1737" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1738" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-167">\rm Ca^{2+}, Mg^{2+}</script></span> ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-168-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1739" style="width: 2.133em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1001.72em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1740"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1742"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1744"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1745"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1746" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1747" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-168">\rm Fe^{2+} </script></span> এর ক্লোরাইড ও সালফেট অধিক পরিমাণে দ্রবীভূত থাকলে স্থায়ী খরতা হয়, যা ফুটিয়ে দূর করা যায় না।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১১১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-172-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1774" style="width: 3.19em;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: উভধর্মী আয়ন সমূহ: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-173-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo>,</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msubsup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1782" style="width: 13.527em;                                         <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: তীব্র এসিডের অনুবন্ধী ক্ষার দুর্বল এবং দুর্বল এসিডের অনুবন্ধী ক্ষার তীব্র হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০৫]</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 66 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-179-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1854" style="width: 1.678em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1855"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1856"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.93em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1857"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1858"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.933em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1861" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1913" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1914"><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কার্বানায়নের স্থায়িত্বের ক্রম <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-188-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1990" style="width: 9.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.543em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1007.38em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1991"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1992" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1993"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1994" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.486em, 1000.62em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1995" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1996" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1999"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2000"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2001" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2002" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2004"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2005"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2006" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2007" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2008" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2009"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2010"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo></msubsup><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-188">\rm CH_3^->1°>2°>3°</script></span><br>
ফ্রি-রেডিকেলের স্থায়িত্বের ক্রম <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-189-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2012" style="width: 9.182em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2013"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2014" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2015"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2016"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2020"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2021"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2025"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2026"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২১৬]</p>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-196-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2072" style="width: 3.418em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.78em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.74em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2073"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2074" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2075" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2076" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2077" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-196">\rm NaOH </script></span></p>

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-197-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2078" style="width: 4.328em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সোডিয়াম বেনজোয়েট লবণ ও সোডা লাইমের মিশ্রণকে তাপ দিলে বেনজিন বাষ্প <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-198-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>.</mo><mn>80.4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2103;</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2088" style="width: 5.412em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.428em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.35em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2089"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2091" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2092" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2095" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">80.4</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2096"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2097"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2098"><span style="font-family: STIXGeneral, &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;, serif; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২০৩]</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: গ্রিগনার্ড বিকারক হল অ্যালকাইল বা অ্যারাইল ম্যাগনেসিয়াম হ্যালাইড।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৭১]</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 74 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-200-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></msub><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2107" style="width: 2.014em;
