                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-201-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2113" style="width: 1.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1000.87em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2114"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2116"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2117"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-201">\rm 1° </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-202-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2119" style="width: 1.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1000.87em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2120"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2122"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2123"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-202">\rm 2° </script></span></p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-205-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></msub><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2137" style="width: 1.682em; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></msub><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-205">\rm S_N 2 </script></span> বিক্রিয়ার ক্ষেত্রে RX এর সক্রিয়তার ক্রম <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-207-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2171" style="width: 12.502em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.248em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1010.25em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2172"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2173" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2175"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2176" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2177" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2178" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2179" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2181"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2183" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2192"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2194" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>,</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-207">\rm -CH_3,-NH_2,-OH,-OCH_3</script></span> ইত্যাদি অর্থো-প্যারা নির্দেশক ও বেনজন বলয় সক্রিয়কারী।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৩২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 76 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি কার্বক্সিলিক এসিড?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৭৫]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 77 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ক্যালসিয়াম কার্বাইডের আর্দ্রবিশ্লেষণের ফলে কোনটি উৎপন্ন হয়?</p>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৪৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-221-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2314" style="width: 2.143em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: মোটা আঁশ বা সুতার তৈরি গেঞ্জি ও কাপড়ের ব্লিচিং কাজে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-224-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2340" style="width: 1.395em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.15em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2341"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2343"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2345" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-224">\rm Cl_2 </script></span> পানি ব্যবহৃত হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৬৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ফেনল রেড অম্লীয় মাধ্যমে হলুদ এবং লিটমাস অম্লীয় মাধ্যমে লাল বর্ণ দেয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৮৯]</p>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>20°C তাপমাত্রায় গ্যাসের মোলার আয়তন কত লিটার?</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>24.789</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: STP তে ও SATP তে মোলার আয়তন যথাক্রমে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-225-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>22.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2346" style="width: 5.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.305em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.3em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2347"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">22.4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2353"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2355"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2356"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2357" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2358" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>22.4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-225">\rm 22.4\ Lmol^{-1} </script></span> ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-226-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>24.789</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2359" style="width: 6.273em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.125em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1005.12em, 2.133em, -999.998em);                                     <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 83 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>250 ml NaOH এর দ্রবণে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-227-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5.0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2372" style="width: 6.187em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.069em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1005.03em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2373"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5.0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5.0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-227">\rm 5.0\ g\ NaOH </script></span> দ্রবীভূত আছে। ঐ দ্রবণে NaOH এর মোলার ঘনমাত্রা কত?</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>দ্রবণে NaOH এর মোলার ঘনমাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-228-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>250</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>40</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2382" style="width: 8.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1006.89em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2383"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2385" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.3em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.145em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2386"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2387" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2388" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2389" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1000</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.3em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.145em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2390"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2391" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">250</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2392" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2393" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">40</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.42em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>250</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>40</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-228">\rm = \frac{5\times1000}{250\times40}M=0.5\ M</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৬]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ক্যালোমেল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-232-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2421" style="width: 3.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1003.12em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2422"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2425"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2427" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2429"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2431" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2432" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-232">\rm (Hg_2Cl_2)</script></span> তড়িৎদ্বার গৌণ নির্দেশক তড়িৎদ্বার।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৮২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 93 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-233-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2433" style="width: 6.149em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2434"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2436" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2437" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2439" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2442"><span style="display: inline-block;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: প্রতি মোল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-234-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2448" style="width: 2.42em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2449"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2451"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2453"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2454"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2455" style="font-size: 70.7%; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৬৩]</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

                                        <br>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: শুষ্ক কোষে কার্বন দণ্ড ধনাত্মক তড়িৎদ্বার ক্যাথোড হিসেবে কাজ করে। শুষ্ক কোষে বিদ্যুৎ উত্তেজক হিসেবে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-240-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2498" style="width: 2.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.42em, 2.256em, -999.998em); [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬০৫]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>BAPEX- বাংলাদেশে তেল গ্যাস অনুসন্ধানকারী সংস্থা।&nbsp;<br>
গ্যাস উৎপাদনের জন্য বাংলাদেশকে মোট ২৩টি ব্লকে ভাগ করা হয়েছে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৫০]</p>
</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-241-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2506" style="width: 2.143em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2507"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2508"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; </label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ৭টি কারখানায় প্রাকৃতিক গ্যাস হতে ইউরিয়া সার উৎপাদিত হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৫০]</p>
</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: Water gas&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-245-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2526" style="width: 8.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1007.26em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2527"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2533" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2535" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2536" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2537" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-245">\rm = (CO+H_2)=1:1</script></span>;<br>
প্রোডিউসার গ্যাস <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-246-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2541" style="width: 8.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1007.26em, 2.338em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2548" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2550" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2551" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>:</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-246">\rm = (CO+N_2 )=2:1 </script></span>।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৫৯]</p>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি পটাস গ্লাস দিয়ে তৈরি?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ওয়াচ গ্লাস, ফানেল, লিবিগ শীতক → Soft glass।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-০৫]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি সেকেন্ডারি স্ট্যান্ডার্ড পদার্থ?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 8.928em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সেকেন্ডারি স্ট্যান্ডার্ড পদার্থ:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="width: 13.035em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-43"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-44" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-45" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-46" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-47" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-48" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-49" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                         <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৩৩]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: প্রধান শক্তিস্তরে সর্বোচ্চ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="width: 1.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1000.86em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-108"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-109"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-111" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm e^-</script></span> ধারণ ক্ষমতা = <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-112" style="width: 1.518em; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm 2n^2</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১০৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>s-অরবিটালের আকৃতি কেমন?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গোলক আকার</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ডিম্বাকার&nbsp;</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ডাম্বেলাকার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ডাবল ডাম্বেলাকার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: s-অরবিটালের আকৃতি - গোলক আকার;<br>
d-অরবিটালের আকৃতি - ডাবল ডাম্বেলাকার;<br>
f-অরবিটালের আকৃতি - জটিলাকৃতি।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ১১৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 10 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>Na পরমাণুর বর্ণালিতে প্রাপ্ত সূক্ষ্ম রেখার বর্ণ কেমন?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>লাল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>হলুদ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বেগুনি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নীল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: Na-পরমাণুর বর্ণালিতে কালো স্থান বা ব্যান্ড দ্বারা পৃথককৃত দুটি উজ্জ্বল হলুদ বর্ণের সূক্ষ্ম রেখা থাকে।।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ১৪৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>780</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1000</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-150" style="width: 7.789em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.378em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1006.38em, 2.461em, -999.998em); </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১৩৫]</p>

                                            <span>Question 12 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>মানবদেহের বিপাক ক্রিয়ায় উৎপন্ন তাপ কোন রশ্মি হিসেবে পরিবেশে বিকিরিত হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>মানবদেহের বিকিরিত IR রশ্মির পরিসর হলো <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>8</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-158" style="width: 4.428em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.609em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.61em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-159"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-160" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-161" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-162" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">12</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-163" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-164" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-165" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>μ</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm 8-12\ \mu m </script></span> যা Body IR রশ্মি নামে পরিচিত।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ১৫৬]</p>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সালফেট মূলকে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-166" style="width: 3.951em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="width: 2.297em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1001.89em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-181"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-183"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.99em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-185"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-186"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-189" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo></mrow></msubsup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\rm SO_4^{2-}</script></span> এর ইলেকট্রন সংখ্যা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>16</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="width: 10.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1008.4em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-191"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-195"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>16</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm =\left(16+4\times8+2\right)=50</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১১৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 14 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-206" style="width: 3.02em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.46em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-207"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-210" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-211"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.71em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.26em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.263em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm AlCl_3 </script></span> এর ক্ষেত্রে দ্রাব্যতা S হলে দ্রাব্যতা গুণফল কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><br>

[যখন <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-271" style="width: 2.461em;
