width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-278" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\rm AlCl_3 </script></span> এর দ্রাব্যতা <em><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-279" style="width: 3.814em; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-291" style="width: 0.658em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>.</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>27</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-294" style="width: 16.477em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ১৬৫]</p>
</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="width: 1.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1000.86em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-342"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-343"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-345" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\rm e^-</script></span> বিন্যাসের নীতি মেনে চলে না-<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-346" style="width: 15.207em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1012.46em, 2.297em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31">\rm Cr,\ Cu,\ Mo,\ Au,\ La,\ Th,\ Cm,\ Ag</script></span>&nbsp;প্রভৃতি।<br>
[কবীর স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ১০৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 17 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন কণা দ্বৈত ধর্ম প্রদর্শন করে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ইলেকট্রন</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>প্রোটন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আলফা</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নিউট্রন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ডি-ব্রগলীর মতবাদ অনুযায়ী ইলেকট্রনের কণা ও তরঙ্গ উভয় ধর্মই রয়েছে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৯৭]</p>
</span>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 18 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>যে সকল পরমাণুর প্রোটন সংখ্যা সমান তারা পরস্পর-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আইসোটোন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আইসোবার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আইসোটোপ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আইসোইলেকট্রিক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>পরমাণুর ক্ষেত্রে-<br>
প্রোটন সংখ্যা সমান, নিউট্রন সংখ্যা অসমান- আইসোটোপ;<br>
প্রোটন সংখ্যা অসমান, ভর সংখ্যা সমান- আইসোবার;<br>
প্রোটন সংখ্যা অসমান, নিউট্রন সংখ্যা সমান- আইসোটোন<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="width: 1.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1000.86em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-396"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-397"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm e^-</script></span>সংখ্যা সমান- আইসোইলেকট্রিক।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১০৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>s-ব্লক মৌল: ১৪টি; p-ব্লক মৌল: ৩৬টি; d-ব্লক মৌল: ৪১টি; f-ব্লক মৌল: ২৭টি।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-২৫৯]</p>
</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 20 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>অবস্থান্তর মৌলের বৈশিষ্ট্য নয় কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পরিবর্তনশীল জারণ অবস্থা</p>

                                        <br>

                                            <p>কোন গ্রুপের মৌলসমূহ চ্যালকোজেন নামে পরিচিত?</p>

</span>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 24 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন মৌলটি বুনসেন শিখায় বিশেষ কোন বর্ণ সৃষ্টি করে না?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: Be ও Mg বুনসেন শিখায় বিশেষ কোনো বর্ণ সৃষ্টি করে না।<br>

                                        <br>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="width: 2.552em;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="width: 1.869em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.505em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.46em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-541"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\rm CO </script></span></p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span style="line-height:110%"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="line-height:110%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif">Strong Field Ligand:</span></span></span></span><br>
<span style="line-height:110%"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="line-height:110%"><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif"><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                             <span>Question 30 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটির আয়নিক ব্যাসার্ধ সর্বাধিক?</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-594" style="width: 2.507em;                                         <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-২৯৩]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>বন্ধন কোণ:<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>107</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>102.5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>94</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; <p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৩২৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 34 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><strong>সমযোজী ধর্মের বৃদ্ধিক্রমের ক্ষেত্রে নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?</strong></p>

padding-left: 0.276em;">&gt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-815" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-816" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-819" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">&gt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-824" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">&gt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-825" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-826" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-827" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.108em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>&gt;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\rm NaF>NaBr>NaCl>NaI </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><strong>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪২]</strong></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 35 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন বন্ধনের উপস্থিতির কারণে পানি কক্ষ তাপমাত্রায় তরল?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আয়নিক বন্ধন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমযোজী বন্ধন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সন্নিবেশ বন্ধন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>হাইড্রোজেন বন্ধন</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>H বন্ধনের ভূমিকা:<br>
১। পানি কক্ষ তাপমাত্রায় তরল<br>
২। প্রোটিনের পলি অ্যামাইড শিকলের সেকেন্ডারি ও টারশিয়ারি কাঠামো<br>
৩। বরফের পানিতে ভেসে থাকা<br>
৪। নিউক্লিক এসিডের গঠন (A&nbsp; = T, C&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-828" style="width: 0.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1000.62em, 2.051em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-829"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-830" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">≡</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0.003em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.603em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>≡</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-76">\rm \equiv</script></span> G)<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৩৫৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-853" style="width: 1.459em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.19em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-854"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-855"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-856" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.731em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-857" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-80">\rm H_2 </script></span></p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-858" style="width: 1.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1000.82em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-859"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-81">\rm Pt</script></span>&nbsp;বা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mo>:</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="width: 2.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.34em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-863"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-864"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নিঃসঙ্গ ইলেকট্রন প্রদানের ক্ষমতা</p>

                                            </div>

                                        <br>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 40 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><strong>নিচের কোন </strong>pH&nbsp;<strong>মানের দ্রবণে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-962" style="width: 2.647em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>pH<strong> বৃদ্ধি পেলে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-968" style="width: 2.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.256em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1002.13em, 2.338em, -999.998em);                             <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 41 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বিউটাইল বিউটারেট এস্টার পাওয়া যায় কোথায়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পাকা কলায়</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>

</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>জেসমিন ফুলে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পাকা কলায় থাকে পেন্টাইল অ্যাসিটেট এস্টার।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৩০২]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 42 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো রোগীর রক্তের pH 6.90; এই অবস্থাকে কী বলে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অ্যালকালিসিস</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অ্যাসিডোসিস</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>হাইড্রোসিস</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অ্যালকালিমিয়া</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>মানুষের রক্তের pH<br>
&lt; 7.0 হলে একে অ্যাসিডোসিস বলে;<br>
&gt; 7.45 হলে একে অ্যালকালিসিস বলে।&nbsp;<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫০৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[কবীর স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৫৫]</p>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 44 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কত তাপমাত্রায় ডিপ ফ্রিজে খাদ্যবস্তু সংরক্ষণ করা হয়?</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 51 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্থির তাপমাত্রায় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1.3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1099" style="width: 3.951em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.243em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1003.24em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1100"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.911em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1.3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-114">\rm 1.3\ atm </script></span> চাপে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>500</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="width: 3.914em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.206em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1003.17em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1107"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">500</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>500</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-115">\rm 500\ mL </script></span> আয়তনের একটি গ্যাসকে 1 atm চাপে আনা হলে আয়তন কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1141" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.72em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1144" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.625em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.5em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.268em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1145"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1146" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1147" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1148" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">500</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1149" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.625em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1151" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">650</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1152" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1153" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>500</mn></mrow><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>650</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-116">\rm P_1V_1=P_2V_2 \Rightarrow V_2=\frac{P_1V_1}{P_2}=\frac{1.3\times500}{1}=650\ mL</script></span></p>

<p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 52 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কক্ষ তাপমাত্রায় নাইট্রোজেন গ্যাসের অণুসমূহের বর্গমূল গড়-বর্গ গতিবেগ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>প্রায় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>450</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1166" style="width: 4.829em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>কক্ষ তাপমাত্রায় হাইড্রোজেন অণুর বর্গমূল গড়-বর্গ গতিবেগ প্রায় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1920.12</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1200" style="width: 5.699em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.674em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.67em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1201"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1920.12</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1205"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1207"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1208"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1209" style="font-size: 70.7%; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭০]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 54 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুটি গ্যাস অণুর গড় গতিশক্তি কখন সমান হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>চাপ সমান থাকলে</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আয়তন সমান হলে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: গ্যাসের গড় গতিশক্তি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1211" style="width: 6.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.961em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.88em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1212"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1214"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1218" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1220" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1221" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-122">\rm (E_k=\frac{3}{2}nRT) </script></span> নির্ভর করে গ্যাসের পরিমাণ (n) ও কেলভিন তাপমাত্রার উপর।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                            <span>Question 55 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন গ্যাসটির ব্যাপন হার বেশি?</p>

                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: স্থির তাপমাত্রা ও চাপে কম মোলার ভরের গ্যাসের ব্যাপন হার তুলনামূলক বেশি হবে।<br>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="width: 2.37em;                                 </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বায়ুতে তাপমাত্রা বৃদ্ধিতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-131-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1270" style="width: 1.928em; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: পানিতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-136-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1308" style="width: 5.33em;
