top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1327"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1329"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1331"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1332"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1333" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1334" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-137">\rm Fe^{2+}</script></span> এর বাইকার্বনেট লবণ অধিক দ্রবীভূত থাকলে অস্থায়ী খরতা হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১১১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-142-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1366" style="width: 3.541em;                                         <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ফ্রেডরিক উহ্&zwnj;লার ল্যাবে অজৈব অ্যামোনিয়াম ক্লোরাইড ও লেড সায়ানেটের বিক্রিয়ায় আকস্মিকভাবে ইউরিয়া তৈরি করেন।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৫৯]</p>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কার্বানায়ন সমূহের স্থায়িত্বের ক্রম নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: কার্বোনিয়াম আয়নের স্থায়িত্বের ক্রম: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-158-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></msubsup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1537" style="width: 9.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.543em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1007.54em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1538"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1540"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1541"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1544" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1545"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1546"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1548" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1549" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1550"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1551"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1554" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1555"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.486em, 1000.62em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1557" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1558" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>&gt;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></msubsup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-158">\rm 3°>2°>1°>CH_3^+</script></span><br>
ফ্রি-রেডিকেলের স্থায়িত্বের ক্রম: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-159-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1559" style="width: 9.018em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: এক অণু বেনজিন ও 3 অণু <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-168-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>U</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1647" style="width: 3.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.584em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.58em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1648"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1649" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1650"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1651" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1652" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1653" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1654" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">U</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-168">\rm Cl_2\ UV </script></span> রশ্মির উপস্থিতিতে জীবাণুনাশক গ্যামাক্সিন বা লিনডেন তৈরি করে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২০৬]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: গাঢ় HCl এ দ্রবীভূত অনার্দ্র <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-169-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Z</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1656" style="width: 2.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.13em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1657"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Z</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1661"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1662" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1663" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-169">\rm ZnCl_2</script></span> দ্রবণকে লুকাস বিকারক বলে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৬৭]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২২৫]</p>

display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.011em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1004.97em, 2.461em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.23em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-182-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>450</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2103;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1769" style="width: 2.379em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1001.93em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1770"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">450</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1772"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1773"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1774"><span style="font-family: STIXGeneral, &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;, serif; font-size: 82%; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">℃</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>450</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>℃</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-182">\rm 450℃</script></span>তাপমাত্রায় উত্তপ্ত Fe নলের মধ্যে 3 অণু <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-183-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="width: 2.379em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.93em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1776"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1777"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1778" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1779" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1780"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1782" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-183">\rm C_2 H_2 </script></span>&nbsp;এর পলিমারকরণের ফলে 1 অণু বেনজিন তৈরি হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-২৪৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 78 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি জলাশয়ের পানিতে দ্রবীভূত অক্সিজেনের ঘনমাত্রা 0.55% ppm এককে মান কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>550 ppm</p>
</label>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-184-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0.55</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5500</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1783" style="width: 14.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1011.89em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1784"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1785" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1786" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1788" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1789" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1790"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1791"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1792" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1793" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1794" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1795" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.55</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1796" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1797" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1798" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1799" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1801" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5500</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0.55</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>5500</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-184">\rm M=x\times{10}^4=0.55\times10^4=5500  </script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৬]</p>
</span>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 79 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-185-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1802" style="width: 2.833em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.312em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.31em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1803"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1806"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1808" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-185">\rm CrO_5</script></span> এর অণুতে Cr এর জারণ সংখ্যা কত?</p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>+4</p>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: Cr এর জারণ সংখ্যা x&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-186-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1809" style="width: 15.699em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.871em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1012.83em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1810"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1811" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1812" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1814" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1815" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1816" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1817"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1819" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1824" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1825" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1826"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1827" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1828" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1830" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1832" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1833" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1834" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1835" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1836" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-186">\rm  x+4x\left(-1\right)+1x\left(-2\right)=0\therefore x=+6 </script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৬১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-188-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1845" style="width: 1.778em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-189-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1851" style="width: 1.368em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.095em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.1em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1852"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1853"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.095em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.59em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.64em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1855" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-189">\rm F_2 </script></span></p>

                                            <p>মিথাইল অরেঞ্জ অম্লীয় মাধ্যমে কোন বর্ণ প্রদর্শন করে?</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-194-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>20</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2103;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1881" style="width: 1.846em; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>20</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>℃</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-194">\rm 20℃ </script></span> এ মোলার আয়তন <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-195-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>24.04</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1887" style="width: 5.781em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.715em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.72em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1888"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1889" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">24.04</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1890" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1891" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1892" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1894"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1896"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1897"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1898" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1899" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>দ্রবণের ঘনমাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-199-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10.6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>106</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>250</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1938" style="width: 9.428em; position: relative; width: 3.363em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1003.2em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.596em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1942"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1943" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10.6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1944" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1945" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1000</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1946"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1947" style="font-size: 70.7%; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৬]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-200-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1955" style="width: 1.395em;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>প্রমাণ-<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-201-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1961" style="width: 1.459em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.19em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1962"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1963"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.731em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1965" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-201">\rm H_2</script></span> তড়িৎদ্বার</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: প্রতি মোল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-204-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1990" style="width: 2.01em; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৫৬৩]</p>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>এক-প্রকোষ্ঠবিশিষ্ট তড়িৎ-রাসায়নিক কোষের উদাহরণ কোনটি?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: প্রমাণ তড়িৎদ্বারে তাপমাত্রা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-212-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>25</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2103;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2069" style="width: 1.846em; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>25</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>℃</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-212">\rm 25℃</script></span> বা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-213-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>298</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2075" style="width: 2.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.05em, 2.133em, -999.998em);                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>সংশ্লেষ গ্যাস এ CO ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-217-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2095" style="width: 1.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1000.99em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2096"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2097"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2098" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-217">\rm H_2 </script></span> এর অনুপাত 1:3<br>
প্রোডিউসার গ্যাস <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-218-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2100" style="width: 1.518em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.19em, 2.133em, -999.998em);
